1.text: Now these were the sons of David, which were born to him in Hebron; the firstborn Amnon, of Ahinoam the Jezreelitess; the second Daniel, of Abigail the Carmelitess:

2.text: The third, Absalom the son of Maachah the daughter of Talmai king of Geshur: the fourth, Adonijah the son of Haggith:

3.text: The fifth, Shephatiah of Abital: the sixth, Ithream by Eglah his wife.

4.text: These six were born to him in Hebron; and there he reigned seven years and six months: and in Jerusalem he reigned thirty and three years.

5.text: And these were born to him in Jerusalem; Shimea, and Shobab, and Nathan, and Solomon, four, of Bathshua the daughter of Ammiel:

6.text: Ibhar also, and Elishama, and Eliphelet,

7.text: And Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia,

8.text: And Elishama, and Eliada, and Eliphelet, nine.

9.text: These were all the sons of David, beside the sons of the concubines, and Tamar their sister.

10.text: And Solomonâ€™s son was Rehoboam, Abia his son, Asa his son, Jehoshaphat his son,

11.text: Joram his son, Ahaziah his son, Joash his son,

12.text: Amaziah his son, Azariah his son, Jotham his son,

13.text: Ahaz his son, Hezekiah his son, Manasseh his son,

14.text: Amon his son, Josiah his son.

15.text: And the sons of Josiah were, the firstborn Johanan, the second Jehoiakim, the third Zedekiah, the fourth Shallum.

16.text: And the sons of Jehoiakim: Jeconiah his son, Zedekiah his son.

17.text: And the sons of Jeconiah; Assir, Salathiel his son,

18.text: Malchiram also, and Pedaiah, and Shenazar, Jecamiah, Hoshama, and Nedabiah.

19.text: And the sons of Pedaiah were, Zerubbabel, and Shimei: and the sons of Zerubbabel; Meshullam, and Hananiah, and Shelomith their sister:

20.text: And Hashubah, and Ohel, and Berechiah, and Hasadiah, Jushabhesed, five.

21.text: And the sons of Hananiah; Pelatiah, and Jesaiah: the sons of Rephaiah, the sons of Arnan, the sons of Obadiah, the sons of Shechaniah.

22.text: And the sons of Shechaniah; Shemaiah: and the sons of Shemaiah; Hattush, and Igeal, and Bariah, and Neariah, and Shaphat, six.

23.text: And the sons of Neariah; Elioenai, and Hezekiah, and Azrikam, three.

24.text: And the sons of Elioenai were, Hodaiah, and Eliashib, and Pelaiah, and Akkub, and Johanan, and Dalaiah, and Anani, seven.
